entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wow, that looks bad! I don't have time at the moment to investigate, but thanks for reporting. I'll try to look at it soon. #26418
  • In net6, Can I GeneratePackageOnBuild for a SingleFile console application #26419
  • dotnet-format broken in 7.0.100-preview.5 #26412

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26420
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [QB Mode] Fix Workload Restore Crashes #26405
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix typo in string resource #26294
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded to the current framework #26334
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID target from lower macOS to the latest one #25784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26359
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21539
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

Updated

  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
